name: E.V.O.: The Theory of Evolution
overview: It's time to start your own exciting Theory of Evolution! 4.6 billion years ago, a miraculous planet was born in a small corner of the universe. 1 billion years after that Life emerged there, and it was given an important mission... That Life..., was you! Your story beings in the seas 400 million years ago, home of the first fish, the Thelodus. One day these once peaceful waters are touched by the long reach of the Devil... This is a role-playing game where you start as a fish with four different attributes (Wisdom, Vitality, Endurance, and Attack). Your character's evolution is based on the choices you make with every evolution point. With 200 different possible evolutions, which one will you become?
